params.accountToGuard: Account that requested the caller to become a guardian.

returns._0: bool True if the guardian was activated, false if already active.

returns.isActive: True if the guardian is active.
returns.isPresent: True if the guardian is configured for the account.

params.data: ABI-encoded payload forwarded to the validator.
params.recoveryType: Validator type that will regain access.

isInitialized(address).details: Returns if the module was already initialized for a provided smartaccount

isModuleType(uint256).details: Returns boolean value if module is a certain type

params.moduleTypeId: the module type ID according the ERC-7579 spec MUST return true if the module is of the given type and false otherwise

onInstall(bytes).details: This function is called by the smart account during installation of the module

params.data: arbitrary data that may be required on the module during `onInstall` initialization MUST revert on error

onUninstall(bytes).details: This function is called by the smart account during uninstallation of the module

params.data: arbitrary data that may be required on the module during `onUninstall` de-initialization MUST revert on error

params.newGuardian: Address of the guardian to add after acceptance.

params.guardianToRemove: Address of the guardian to remove.

supportsInterface(bytes4).details: Returns true if this contract implements the interface defined by `interfaceId`. See the corresponding https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-165#how-interfaces-are-identified[ERC section] to learn more about how these ids are created. This function call must use less than 30 000 gas.

acceptGuardian(address).notice: Accept a pending guardian proposal for a given account.

discardRecovery().notice: Cancel any ongoing recovery process for the caller's account.

finalizeRecovery(address,bytes).notice: Finalize a pending recovery after the delay has elapsed.

guardianStatusFor(address,address).notice: Get the status of a specific guardian for an account.

guardiansFor(address).notice: List all guardians configured for an account.

initializeRecovery(address,uint8,bytes).notice: Begin the recovery process for an account using a specified validator type.

onUninstall(bytes).notice: Removes all past guardians when this module is disabled in a account

proposeGuardian(address).notice: Propose a new guardian candidate for the caller's account.

removeGuardian(address).notice: Remove an existing guardian from the caller's account.
